attributes.action: make it illegal for lorries to use anything but the inside lane on motorways and dual carriageways
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
A recent experiment was carried out on the Northern section of the M42, restricting vehicals over a certain size to the inside lane. The result from my observations, was that the flow of traffic greatly improved.
We have all been in the situation on major roads when lorries try to overtake and find that they haven't got enough power, subsequently causing the traffic behind to back up suddenly. Keeping them to the inside lane, prevents this type of local congestion and will make the roads safer.
